review_blob:
Quoted from the advertisement on the bottle " The Verte du Mont Blanc is a unique beer because it marries our excellent brewing reputation with a local alpine flower, the Gnpi. The Result? A fine and light beer, the best of the Alps in your glass... To your health!"

1) Adding some hop into water and brewing the mix doesnt make necessarily a - what people commonly call - beer.
2) First time of my life I see some artificial coloring substances added into a "beer" ; To our health, really ?
3) With a light body, a thin texture, a flat carbonation and sweet finish for taste Id rather drink a Corona ten times thant a single sip of that... thing.
